Jawbreaker.name: Jawbreaker
descriptions: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 0.5 sec.
Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 1 sec.
Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 1.5 sec.

Operator.name: Operator
descriptions: Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike and Backstab abilities by 3.
Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike and Backstab abilities by 5.

Lightning Reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
descriptions: Increases your Dodge chance by 1%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 2%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 3%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 4%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 5%.

Treachery.name: Treachery
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 20%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 30%.

Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 1%.
Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 3%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 5%.

Duelist.name: Duelist
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 25%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 50%.

Endurance.name: Endurance
descriptions: The Rogue gains 10% movement speed while unstealthed and at full energy.
The Rogue gains 20% movement speed while unstealthed and at full energy.
The Rogue gains 30% movement speed while unstealthed and at full energy.

Riposte.name: Riposte
descriptions: A strike that becomes active after parrying or blocking an opponent's attack.  This attack deals 150% weapon damage and disarms the target for 6 seconds, and cannot be blocked, dodged or parried. This attack causes a high amount of threat and awards 1 combo point.

Interloper.name: Interloper
descriptions: Gives a 50% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability, and reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by 60 sec.
Gives a 100% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability, and reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by 120 sec.

Combat Boots.name: Combat Boots
descriptions: Gives your Kick ability a 50% chance to silence the target for 2 seconds, and reduces the energy cost of Kick by 50%.
Gives your Kick ability a 100% chance to silence the target for 2 seconds, and reduces the energy cost of Kick by 100%.

Switchblade.name: Switchblade
descriptions: Increases your skill with Daggers by 5, gives your attacks with Daggers a 5% chance to restore 5 energy.
Increases your skill with Daggers by 10, gives your attacks with Daggers a 10% chance to restore 5 energy.

Precision.name: Precision
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 5%.

Bludgeon.name: Bludgeon
descriptions: Increases your skill with Maces by 5, and gives you a 5% chance to stun your target for 3 seconds with a mace.
Increases your skill with Maces by 10, and gives you a 10% chance to stun your target for 3 seconds with a mace.

Blade Flurry.name: Blade Flurry
descriptions: Increases your attack speed by 20%.  In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.  Lasts 15 seconds.

Cutlass.name: Cutlass
descriptions: Increases your skill with Swords by 5, and gives you a 5% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Increases your skill with Swords by 10, and gives you a 10% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
descriptions: Increases your skill with Fist Weapons by 5, and increases your chance to get a critical strike with Fist Weapons by 5%.
Increases your skill with Fist Weapons by 10, and increases your chance to get a critical strike with Fist Weapons by 10%.

Commando.name: Commando
descriptions: You have a 25% chance to gain a combo point whenever one of your attacks is dodged. In addition, you have a 25% chance to reset your swing timer after parrying, dodging or blocking an attack.
You have a 50% chance to gain a combo point whenever one of your attacks is dodged. In addition, you have a 50% chance to reset your swing timer after parrying, dodging or blocking an attack.
You have a 75% chance to gain a combo point whenever one of your attacks is dodged. In addition, you have a 75% chance to reset your swing timer after parrying, dodging or blocking an attack.
You have a 100% chance to gain a combo point whenever one of your attacks is dodged. In addition, you have a 100% chance to reset your swing timer after parrying, dodging or blocking an attack.

Swashbuckler.name: Swashbuckler
descriptions: While wielding a Sword and Buckler, the Rogue is guaranteed to strike twice in melee combat.

Aggression.name: Aggression
descriptions: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike and Eviscerate abilities by 3%.
Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike and Eviscerate abilities by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike and Eviscerate abilities by 10%.

Adrenaline Rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
descriptions: The Rogue gains a rush of adrenaline after each finishing move. This grants the rogue significantly increased energy and health regeneration rate, and lasts until they expend energy.
